thread.title: Comey: FBI has no evidence to support Trump’s wiretap claim | New York Post
thread.title_full: Comey: FBI has no evidence to support Trump’s wiretap claim | New York Post

author: Associated Press
title: Comey: FBI has no evidence to support Trump’s wiretap claim | New York Post
text:
FBI Director James Comey says the FBI and Justice Department have no information to substantiate President Donald Trump’s claims that former President Barack Obama wiretapped him before the election.
SEE ALSO 
James Comey testifies before House Intelligence Committee 0:0 FBI Director James Comey will testify before a House panel... Comey says no individual can order surveillance of an American. He says courts grant this permission after a rigorous application process.
Comey was testifying before the House intelligence committee .
Comey said the Justice Department also asked him to share with the committee that the answer also applies to the Justice Department and its various components. The Justice Department oversees the FBI and other law enforcement agencies.
